Definition: In this task, you are given an Amazon food product review and its summary. Your task is to generate "true" if the given review and summary match, and to generate "false" if they do not match.

Positive Examples.input:
I have bought several of the Vitality canned dog food products and have found them all to be of good quality. The product looks more like a stew than a processed meat and it smells better. My Labrador is finicky and she appreciates this product better than  most. 
 Summary: Good Quality Dog Food
Positive Examples.explanation: The customer talked about dog food which was good. So, it's a correct Summary. So, the correct answer is true.

Positive Examples.input:
Product arrived labeled as Jumbo Salted Peanuts...the peanuts were actually small sized unsalted. Not sure if this was an error or if the vendor intended to represent the product as "Jumbo". 
 Summary: Not as Advertised
Positive Examples.explanation: The customer didn't get the product they show in the advertisement. So, it's a correct Summary. So, the correct answer is True.

Positive Examples.input:
Great taffy at a great price.  There was a wide assortment of yummy taffy.  Delivery was very quick.  If your a taffy lover, this is a deal. 
 Summary: Good Oatmeal
Positive Examples.explanation: The customer is neutral with the product and he has some complaint. So the summary is incorrect.

Negative Examples.input:
My daughter loves twizzlers and this shipment of six pounds really hit the spot. It's exactly what you would expect...six packages of strawberry twizzlers. 
 Summary: Lots of twizzlers, just what you expect.
Negative Examples.explanation: It's only supposed to say if the Polarity of given review is "True" or "False"

Negative Examples.input:
I ordered this product for a themed baby shower. They went over well and they tasted just like normal cracker jacks. Loved that I could find the box and they fit perfect in favor bags. 
 Summary: It's a fine cracker
Negative Examples.explanation: It's a correct summary so the answer should be true.

Negative Examples.input:
My cats have been happily eating Felidae Platinum for more than two years. I just got a new bag and the shape of the food is different. They tried the new food when I first put it in their bowls and now the bowls sit full and the kitties will not touch the food. I've noticed similar reviews related to formula changes in the past. Unfortunately, I now need to find a new food that my cats will eat. 
 Summary: My cats loved the food.
Negative Examples.explanation: The customer's cat really didn't eat the food customer order so the summary is wrong. So, the correct answer should be false.

Instances.input:
The products are wonderful and fresh!!  Everything reported about the chips is on target, and I would recommend them to others.  Amazon's services are fantastic!! 
 Summary: Pop Chips

Super tasty quick meal.  It's a bit small, but perfect for a lunch on the go.  Definitely not going to help you with any dinner hunger pangs though.  The sodium is a little higher than I'd like, but I really can't beat it for economic and efficient lunchfood. 
 Summary: Love it.

Having eaten (and re-eaten) my way though all of the DAS caramel range, this remains my all-time favorite, and the one that usually gets the most rave reviews when I share them (which isn't an easy thing to do - just try one and you'll see what I mean).  I've been a caramel fan for ages, and while Werthers Butterscotch will do in a pinch, nothing has come closer to what my mother used to make than these.  They are chewy, buttery, and the little crunches of salt are spectacular (OK my mother didn't put salt in hers, this is an improvement). 
 Summary: This caramel is fantastic!!!

If you like nuts and you're looking for a healthy, great tasting snack, you can't go wrong with Almond Crunch!  My husband and I recently eliminated high fructose corn syrup and partially hydrogenated soybean oil from our diet and we feel so much better.  Trying to find tasty snacks that don't contain these products is not easy so we were thrilled to find Mrs. Mays Naturals.  We love the Cashew Crunch as well! 
 Summary: Fantastic!

After reading other reviews, I was looking forward to trying the Haribo strawberry gummi candy.  I was very disappointed with this candy.  Although these candies are shaped like strawberries, their flavor and scent do not resemble strawberries at all. In addition, the gummi candies lack sweetness.  After sampling several of the strawberries, I am going to throw away the remainder of the bag.  Disgusting!  Try the Haribo gummi peaches.  Those candies are wonderful. 
 Summary: Poor Quality and Taste

i wanted something that had enough meat so my mini schnauzer would want to bite on it however i needed something that could entice him to chew on this rather than my apartment. THis bone was not the solution. There is practically no meat on this bone and after two minutes of chewing he lost interest in it. I threw it away after the first week snce he never touched it again. 
 Summary: Bone

This popcorn is really great!  We enjoy the taste and the smallness of the actual popcorn.  Its not like the popcorn that is big and fluffy its small and really great to eat.  I eat only this popcorn now and order every three months. Highly recommend to the popcorn lovers of the world. 
 Summary: GREAT HULL LESS POPCORN

Tasty, slightly different flavors then other brands, but good. In all other respects good purchase. Hard to find in US so I am not too picky. 
 Summary: Excellent for authentic Chinese dishes!
